name: Swarm of Gremishkas
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.Limited Spell Immunity: The swarm automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 3rd level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.
traits.Swarm: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny gremishka. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
